room_title: Escape room " Valley of the Kings" by Puzzle Room Reno in Reno
room_address: 135 N Sierra Street, Suite B, Reno NV 89501
room_description:
It's a myth that's been passed on for hundreds of years. One that tells of an artifact that holds secrets in history and the solutions to the questions that scientists have been asking. The pharaohs had hidden it, deep in the pyramids chambers. The story describes clues being placed discretely throughout, meant to lead only the gods to its treasures.
You learn of a curse that has it protected. You believe you have uncovered enough information to find your way to the heart of the pyramid. Time is short and you have to work quickly to prevent the curse from catching you.
